summary: This is an email communication from August 16, 2019, regarding the reassignment of probationary correctional officers at MCC New York. It references employee rights under the Master Agreement and requests policy documentation about probationary staff working in the Special Housing Unit.

events.title: Reassignment of Correctional Officers at MCC New York
events.description: Lieutenants began informing Correctional Officers that they would be reassigned to work SHU MW posts because management determined they no longer want probationary staff assigned to that unit.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center where the staff reassignment is occurring

locations.name: Special Housing Unit (SHU)
locations.context: Unit within MCC New York where probationary staff are being reassigned from

keyFacts: Management at MCC New York decided to reassign probationary Correctional Officers from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) posts.
The communication references employee rights under the Master Agreement, specifically Article 18 Sections r and s.
A request was made for the policy, rule, law or regulation that prohibits probationary employees from working in the Special Housing Unit.
The document is dated August 16, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at MCC New York on August 10, 2019.
